title: Add Wallet navigation via selected button and create Wallet route/page

requirements.text: Update ONLY the selected button element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[7]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/form[1]/button[1]) so the visible label reads exactly "Go to Wallet" (English) and clicking it navigates the user to the Wallet page/route.

quotes: Add  button to Dashboard for go to Wallet
The user has selected the following 1 element from the page for context... XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[7]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/form[1]/button[1]

acceptanceCriteria: Only the selected button’s text/behavior changes; no other UI text/buttons are modified.
The selected button’s visible text is exactly "Go to Wallet".
Clicking the selected button navigates to the Wallet route using the app’s hash routing (e.g., #/wallet).

requirements.text: Add a new Wallet route to the hash router and render a new Wallet page when the route is active.

quotes: Add  button to Dashboard for go to Wallet

acceptanceCriteria: The router supports navigating to "/wallet" (hash route).
Navigating to #/wallet renders a Wallet page component.
The Wallet page has a clear title ("Wallet") and provides an in-app way to return to the Dashboard ("Back to Dashboard").

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the user-selected element for the button update (XPath provided).
Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutablePaths.
Do not implement sending emails (including to payakash22@gmail.com), as email features are not supported in this project.
nonGoals: Implementing email notifications on button click.
Implementing real wallet functionality (balances, transactions, deposits/withdrawals), unless explicitly requested later.
